Install nebulizer.sentence: The technician prepares the nebulizer by assembling the necessary components.
Install nebulizer.subject: The technician

Install nebulizer.sentence: The technician ensures that the medication is properly measured and added to the medication cup.
Install nebulizer.subject: The technician

Install nebulizer.sentence: The technician connects the medication cup to the nebulizer and attaches the tubing.
Install nebulizer.subject: The technician

Install nebulizer.sentence: The technician checks that the power source is plugged in and turns on the nebulizer.
Install nebulizer.subject: The technician

Install nebulizer.sentence: The technician instructs the patient on how to use the nebulizer properly during the treatment.
Install nebulizer.subject: The technician
